title: By the King. A proclamation forbidding all levies of forces without His Majesties expresse pleasure, signified under his great seal, and all contributions or assistance to any such levies.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
publicationStmtPublisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,
